short_summary: The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for one senior and one intermediate technician. and one intermediate technician
description: This requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND) for the services of One (1) Senior Technician and One (1) Intermediate Technician, under 5.2, Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services Stream. The intent of this solicitation is to establish up to two (2) Contracts for three (3) initial one (1) year periods, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to two (2) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.
full_summary:
**Title**
 Request for Proposal (RFP)
 Senior Technician and Intermediate Technician Services

**Reference**
W8486-249645/A

**Publication Date**
November 19, 2024

**Closing Date**
December 4, 2024, at 14:00 hours

**Tender Status**
This RFP is open to the public.

**Procurement Category**
SRV

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Traditional

**Trade Agreements**
Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents.

**Regions of Opportunity**
World

**Regions of Delivery**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**
Chris Hunsley, Department of National Defence
Phone (343) 572-8660
Email: [chris.hunsley@forces.gc.ca](mailto:chris.hunsley@forces.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Senior Technician and one (1) Intermediate Technician. This RFP is for the provision of technical engineering and maintenance services under the Stream 5.2. The objective of this RFP is to establish up to two (2) contracts for an initial period of three (3) one-year periods, with the option to extend the term by up to two (2) one-year IRV (irrevocable) periods.

This RFP is only open to the list of pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Download the Tender Documents**

To view the RFP documents, please visit the Canada Buys website, and access the linked document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52115/8-w8486-249645-npp_0.pdf.

**Language of Assessment**
English

This note is a Request for Proposal (RFP), and it is brought to your attention as a courtesy so that interested providers can request the List of Pre-qualified Suppliers if they desire to identify themselves as being Authorized to receive the RFP. 



I added a plus bold title to all sections as it will make it easier for users to distinguish the table of content.


Sincerely,
[Mouss]
Technical Writer.
